comments: The CEO shows strong alignment of resources with strategic priorities through clear goal-setting and transparent budgeting processes. The use of zero-based budgeting and portfolio reviews indicates efficient utilization of resources, reducing non-strategic spend. There is evidence of flexibility via quarterly reallocation meetings, although occasional fast-tracking of non-core requests suggests room for improvement. Overall, performance demonstrates capable leadership with effective resource alignment and management.
